entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
